text: Lesław Grech (born 17 March 1972) is a retired Polish football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Zagłębie Lubin players Category:Śląsk Wrocław players Category:Lechia Zielona Góra players Category:Chrobry Głogów players Category:Górnik Polkowice players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Lesław Grech
